titles.title: It Is Good For Me To Draw Nigh Unto God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It is good for me to draw near unto God;
Lord, I put my trust in Thee:
That I might declare all Thy works, O my God,
Lord, I put my trust in Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My heart and my flesh, they fail me, but
God is the strength of my life;
You are my portion both now and evermore,
There is none that I desire but Thee.
